<p><strong>Happy New Year, Beijing!</strong></p>
<p>This month greets not one but two turns of the year. To mark that  unusual fact, we've dived into our dressing-up box and come up with ...  our <strong>third annual live-action animal-costume comic-strip Cover Feature</strong>. This one is all about a <strong>dragon&nbsp;</strong>and the trials and tribulations he faces in the Beijing property  market. We've all been there &ndash; trouble with the landlord, noisy  neighbors, overzealous <em>baoan</em> &ndash; so here's a tale for the ages.  You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll be in a state of frenzied anticipation  for next year's Snake comic strip.</p><p><a href="http://www.thebeijinger.com/blog/2012/01/01/Out-Now-the-Beijinger-January-2012-Enter-The-Dragon">read more</a></p>
